issue.title: [Rust] Test for build warnings, remove current warnings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Test for build warnings, remove current warnings

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16712267) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
`[~maximilianroos]` are you still working on this and planning to submit a PR?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16712934) by Maximilian Roos (maximilianroos):*
`[~paddyhoran]` I'm not - feel free to take this one. Cheers

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16788558) by Owen Nelson (theomn):*
I just ran a cargo clean and build on the current master branch and didn't see any complaints from rustc. Has this been resolved already, or was this pertaining to some CI I'm not yet aware of?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16788649) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Hey `[~theomn]`, nothing in CI is checking this currently, we all just make sure there are none on each PR I guess.

Feel free to take in on.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16788797) by Owen Nelson (theomn):*
Travis reports "green" on the PR since the state of master was already clean.

If instructed, I'll be happy to push a commit which introduces a warning to confirm the failure case, then reset the branch back to the previous ref.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2409?focusedCommentId=16788824) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3852
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3852>
